shortdesc.ph: Or The usage mode of the audio data returned in the callback.

plentry.pd: 0: Read-only mode, the user only obtains the original data without any modification. For example, when users acquire the data with the Agora SDK, then push the RTMP or RTMPS streams.
1: Write only mode, the user replaces the data in for SDK encoding transmission. For example, when users acquire the data.

2: In read-write mode, the user obtains and modifies the data, and returns it to the SDK for encoding transmission. For example, when users have their own sound-effect processing module and perform some voice pre-processing, such as a voice change.
